Module com.example.project3fx
Package com.example.project3fx

Class Roster

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3fx.Roster
public class Roster extends Object
This class shows the roster of students where you can add, find, grow, size, lookup, check to see if it exists and remove students
Author:
harsh_patel and giancarlo_Andretta

    print()
    Prints the students information in the roster sorted by their last names if two students have the same last name then they are stored by their first name if they have the same first name then they are sorted by their date of birth
    String

    String
    printBySchoolMajor()
    This method prints the roster of student sorted by school major The roster is sorted by school then the by the major within each school
    String
    printByStanding()
    This method sorted and prints the roster of student based on their standing the standing is represented by enum the roster is sorted in sorted by name from a to z by enum type the sorted roster of students is then printed by System.out.print
    boolean
    remove(Student student)
    Remove the given student from the roster then you have to maintain the order of the roster even after removal of that student return true if the removal was done if it wasn't done then return false

    • Roster

      public Roster()
      default constructor Creates a new roster object with an initial capacity of 4

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find(Student student)
      Searches the roster for the given student and returns the index if found returns -1 if not found
      Parameters:
      student - the student to search for in the roster
      Returns:
      the index of the student in the roster or -1 if not found

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Increases the size/capacity of the roster array by 4

    • add

      public boolean add(Student student)
      ADDS A STUDENT TO THE END OF THE ROSTER THEN RETURNS TRUE IF ADDING PROCESS WAS DONE SUCCESSFULLY IF IT WASN'T IT WILL RETURN FALSE
      Parameters:
      student - where the student is going to be added to the roster
      Returns:
      true if the adding process was dont successfully if not it will return false

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      the size of the roster or the length in this case since it is an array
      Returns:
      the size of the roster or the length in this case since it is an array

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      true if the roster is empty else false
      Returns:
      true if the roster is empty else false

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Student student)
      Remove the given student from the roster then you have to maintain the order of the roster even after removal of that student return true if the removal was done if it wasn't done then return false
      Parameters:
      student - object which will be removed from the roster
      Returns:
      true if the removal process was done correctly if not then return false

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Student student)
      contains method is used to check if a particular student object exists in the roster or not
      Parameters:
      student - object which is going to be searched in the roster
      Returns:
      A boolean value which is supposed to tell if the student exists in the roster or not returns true or false

    • lookupAndRemove

      public boolean lookupAndRemove(String fname, String lname, String dob)
      Looks up and removes the student from the roster based on these variables
      Parameters:
      fname - = the first name of the student
      lname - = the last name of the student
      dob - = the date of birth of the student in mm/dd/yyyy
      Returns:
      return true if the student was found and removed if not return false

    • lookup

      public boolean lookup(String fname, String lname, String dob, Major m)
      lookup method overloading This is used to look up student in the roster by their first name, last name, data of birth and major
      Parameters:
      fname - = the first name of the student
      lname - = the last name of the student
      dob - = the date of birth of the student in mm/dd/yyyy
      m - = the major to be updated for the student
      Returns:
      true if the student was found in the roster and their major was updated else return false

    • checkAvailableMajor

      public boolean checkAvailableMajor(String major)
      This checks to see if a particular major is available
      Parameters:
      major - is a string representing the major to be checked
      Returns:
      true if that particular major is available else return false

    • checkAvailableSchool

      public boolean checkAvailableSchool(String school)
      check if the given school name exists in the major enum class
      Parameters:
      school - the name of the school to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the school exists, false otherwise

    • changeMajor

      private boolean changeMajor(int index, Major newMajor)
      Changes the major of a student in the roster
      Parameters:
      index - the student whose major needs changing
      newMajor - the new major for that student
      Returns:
      true if the majoe change was successful, else return false

    • lookup

      public boolean lookup(String fname, String lname, String dob)
      lookup method checks student based on profile returns the status if roster contains the requested student
      Parameters:
      fname - student's first name
      lname - student's last name
      dob - student's date of birth
      Returns:
      true or false

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent(Profile p)
      this methods retrieve student object found in the array
      Parameters:
      p - profile of the student which needs to be retrieved
      Returns:
      on success student object else null

    • printBySchool

      public String printBySchool(String school)
      prints the student in the roster who belong in a particular school
      Parameters:
      school - the name of the school whose student should be printed

    • print

      public String print()
      Prints the students information in the roster sorted by their last names if two students have the same last name then they are stored by their first name if they have the same first name then they are sorted by their date of birth

    • printBySchoolMajor

      public String printBySchoolMajor()
      This method prints the roster of student sorted by school major The roster is sorted by school then the by the major within each school

    • getRoster

      public Student[] getRoster()
      this method return student array
      Returns:
      array of students

    • printByStanding

      public String printByStanding()
      This method sorted and prints the roster of student based on their standing the standing is represented by enum the roster is sorted in sorted by name from a to z by enum type the sorted roster of students is then printed by System.out.print
